title: 2022-03-21 - Conti Ransomware V. 3, Including Decryptor, Leaked

# Conti Ransomware V. 3, Including Decryptor, Leaked

**[threatpost.com/conti-ransomware-v-3-including-decryptor-leaked/179006/](https://threatpost.com/conti-ransomware-v-3-including-decryptor-leaked/179006/)**

## Subscribe to our Threatpost Today newsletter

Twitter

Microsoft Word also leveraged in the email campaign, which uses a 22-year-old Office RCE
bug. [https://t.co/pr5jq08fPx](https://t.co/pr5jq08fPx)
